name: Night Mode
tagline: Night Mode, open-source androd app which dims the screen's brightness even lower than default by creating a mask.
body:
Welcome to the Night Mode open-source android app official website. From here you may visit our github repository to get the source code right here, https://github.com/Darsh0905/Night-Mode.

Need Help Contact me here,
Email - vdstudios9@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
